about_the_game:
Introducing the BLACK BIRD premium pack.
Like a jackdaw's nest, it's full of treasures like art and music!
It's also full of spoilers, so don't peek until you've finished the game, OK?

  • Pixel Art Book
  • Boss Art Book
  • Map of the Kingdom
  • Icon pack (x20)
  • Hand drawn character art by the Director
  • Mini Sound track
    1. Street organ
    2. Stage1 BGM
    3. Theme song
  • STEAM release commemorative wallpaper

----
After downloading Premium Pack, please check that the data has installed into the PremiumPack folder below.
- Open "BLACK BIRD" properties from "Library".
- Open "Browse local files" in "Local file" tab.
- Open "PremiumPack" folder.
detailed_description:
Introducing the BLACK BIRD premium pack.
Like a jackdaw's nest, it's full of treasures like art and music!
It's also full of spoilers, so don't peek until you've finished the game, OK?

  • Pixel Art Book
  • Boss Art Book
  • Map of the Kingdom
  • Icon pack (x20)
  • Hand drawn character art by the Director
  • Mini Sound track
    1. Street organ
    2. Stage1 BGM
    3. Theme song
  • STEAM release commemorative wallpaper

----
After downloading Premium Pack, please check that the data has installed into the PremiumPack folder below.
- Open "BLACK BIRD" properties from "Library".
- Open "Browse local files" in "Local file" tab.
- Open "PremiumPack" folder.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

name: BLACK BIRD Premium Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

short_description: These contents require the base game, BLACK BIRD, in order to view.
